text: Oh, speaking of a drink after finishing work

My dad often drinks beer
and says he feels revived~

But~
isn't it supposed to be bitter?

Apparently that's what makes it good?
But why?

It's hard to explain in one word...
...Well, it's what you'd call an 'adult taste'
You'll understand when you drink it someday, Mei

Then, when I reach the legal drinking age
Let's drink together~ It's a promise~â™ª
